error-codes.error-charge-max-amount: Amount is bigger than the max. amount that can be charged.
error-codes.error-refund-max-amount: Amount is bigger than the max. amount that can be refunded.

payment-details.title: Payment
payment-details.charged-help-text: Charge amount is what you've already collected to your Nets account.

charge.title: Charge (NexiNets payment plugin)
charge.info: You're about to charge Order {orderNumber}. This means the payment will be collected and processed.

refund.title: Refund (NexiNets payment plugin)
refund.info: You're about to initiate Refund for Order {orderNumber}.

cancel.confirmation: You're about to cancel payment with amount of {currency}{amount}.
cancel.title: Cancel (NexiNets payment plugin)

notification.charge-message: You have successfully initiated a capture
notification.refund-title: NexiNets - The refund has been initiated
notification.refund-message: It can take up to 3 bank days before refunds are available on receivers account.
notification.action-error-message: An error occurred while processing the action. Please check the logs.
notification.fetch-error-message: See the logs for more information.
